    name: "goservice"
    host: "goservice"
    port: 10201
    spec {
      transport: GRPC
      propagation: BINARY_FORMAT_PROPAGATION
    }
  }
}

  service {
    name: "goservice"
    host: "goservice"
    port: 10203
    spec {
      transport: HTTP
      propagation: TRACE_CONTEXT_FORMAT_PROPAGATION
    }
  }
  tags {
    key: "key1"
    value: "value1"
  }
  tags {
    key: "key2"
    value: "value2"
  }
}

    name: "pythonservice"
